entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: The main character's uncle, who is grumpy and has a temper. He is described as having his temper 'already under severe strain from lack of food'. ("He therefore settled for looking politely puzzled.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is confused about the letter and doesn't know who would be writing to Uncle Vernon about him. ("Harry's confusion increased. Who would be writing to Uncle Vernon about him? Who did he kn ow who sent letters by the postman?")

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon receives a letter about Harry. ("He brandished a piece of purple writing paper at Harry. 'A letter. About you.'")
